headline: Boston Scientific acquiring Bolt Medical in $443 million deal
summary: Boston Scientific (BSX) has agreed to acquire Bolt Medical for $443 million in order to expand the former's cardiovascular treatment portfolio. The biomedical device manufacturer Market Domination hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton report on the latest news as Boston Scientific shares get a bump higher on this headline. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: Boston Scientific Expands Cardiovascular Treatment Portfolio With $440 Million+ Bolt Medical Deal
summary: On Wednesday, Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) agreed to acquire Bolt Medical, Inc., the developer of an intravascular lithotripsy (IVL) advanced laser-based platform for coronary and peripheral artery disease.
